text: Dennis Morgan (December 30, 1908 â€“ September 7, 1994) was an American actor and singer. He played Jefferson in Christmas in Connecticut. He played Paul Hudson in The Desert Song. Morgan was born Stanley Morner in Prentice, Wisconsin, on December 30, 1908.Screen World Presents the Encyclopedia of Hollywood Film Actors, Vol. 1, ed. Barry Monush (New York: Applause Theatre and Cinema Books, 2003), p. 524 He died in Fresno, California of respiratory failure on September 7, 1994.James Robert Parish; Michael R. Pitts, Hollywood Songsters: Garland to O'Connor, Vol. 2 (New York: Routledge, 2003), p. 622 == References == ==Other websites== * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Singers from Wisconsin Category:Actors from Wisconsin Category:1908 births Category:1994 deaths
title: Dennis Morgan
